verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, send some more Elijahs
To pray the power down
Send the fire and also send the rain
To heal the sick, raise the dead
And glorify Thy name
How I'd love to hear Elijah pray again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, fill us as Elijah with wisdom from above
Send the Word to set Thy people free
That every Job upon this earth
May witness to Thy love
And send Elijah, Lord, unto the Job in me.
